Detailed Description

The SyncMLManager class is a singleton for supporting SyncML applications. It fulfills 3 main tasks: (1) It allows to register datastores as well as the SyncML application and keeps a list of the registered data stores, (2) it provides means for the data store application to signal changes of items, and (3) it allows the SyncML application to retrieve information about the device.

The SyncMLManager maintains a list of registered data stores. Also it keeps a reference to the SyncML application for message posting.

Guid &  db_guid,

Get the data store GUID and URI of the specified index of the internal data store list.

Parameters:
idx[in] : the index of the data store which should be retrieved
db_guid[out] : the GUID of the requested data store
db_uri_id[out] : the URI of the requested data store (short id representation)

BOOLEAN SyncMLManager::PostItemChangedMsg (  UINT16  db_uri,
UINT32  item_uri,
const DateTime &  time_stamp,
SyncMLChangeType  change_code
)  const
 

Allows posting of item change messages at the Apoxi message router, which are forwarded to the SyncML application (if one exists).

Parameters:
db_uri[in] : the URI of the data store.
item_uri[in] : the URI of the data item. In case of SyncMLChangeType::SyncMLItemDeletedAll the item URI must be 0.
time_stamp[in] : the time stamp of the change.
change_code[in] : the operation code for the change.
Returns:
TRUE if succesful, FALSE otherwise.

BOOLEAN SyncMLManager::RegisterDataStore (  const Guid &  db_guid,
UINT16  db_uri_id,
const String &  db_uri_string
) 
 

This method is used to register data stores services (DBService objects). Registration is done with the GUID of the DBService object and the URI of the data store.

Parameters:
db_guid[in] : DBService Guid.
db_uri_id[in] : Database URI (short id representation).
db_uri_string[in] : Database URI (legible string representation).
Returns:
TRUE if successful, FALSE otherwise.

Register the SyncML application at the SyncMLManager.

Parameters:
syncml_app[in] : the pointer to the SyncMLApplication object.
Returns:
TRUE if succesful, FALSE otherwise.
